item.title: Mike Madigan Is Finally Gone. Illinois Remains, Suffering from His Legacy
item.description: His ridiculous longevity was the product of equally ridiculous entrepreneurial sleaze.

item.title: Note to the White House: The U.S. Trade Deficit Is Homegrown
item.description: If President Trump were truly interested in eliminating the trade deficit, he could easily do so by balancing the federal government’s budget.

item.title: Overreaching Judges Are Presenting Trump with a Constitutional Crisis
item.description: The DOGE case pushes the judicial power too far, and tempts a dangerous response.

item.title: Germany: Deindustrialization Depowers On
item.description: The week of February 3, 2025: Germany’s slide, AI & antitrust, credit card price controls, ESG, penny-pinching, and much, much more.

item.title: No to Lori Chavez-DeRemer for Secretary of Labor
item.description: Unions don’t deserve a place in a Republican cabinet.
